Method.name: MySave
Method.Implementation:
quit:$G(pCode)="" 0 set obj = ..%New() ;set obj.PriceListVersion = ##class(BiRLab.CT.PriceListVersion).%OpenId(pCode) set obj.PriceList = ##class(BiRLab.CT.PriceList).%OpenId(pCode) do obj.HospitalPaymentCategorySetObjectId(pHos) set:$G(pDate) obj.ActiveFrom = pDate set obj.Document = $G(pDog) set obj.DocumentType = $G(pDogTyp) set:$G(pDogDat) obj.DateAgreement = pDogDat
set rez = obj.%Save() set id = obj.%Id() quit rez

Method.name: Clear
Method.Implementation: quit:$G(pItem)="" "" &sql(delete from BiRLab_CT.HospitalPaymentCategoryVersion where HospitalPaymentCategory=:pItem ) quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetListPayerByPl
Method.Implementation: &sql(DECLARE cListPayer CURSOR FOR SELECT ID,HospitalPaymentCategory->PayerHospital->Payer->DescriptionShort INTO :id,:payer from BiRLab_CT.HospitalPaymentCategoryVersion where PriceList=:pPl ) &sql(OPEN cListPayer) &sql(FETCH cListPayer) set list = "" While (SQLCODE = 0) { Set list = list_pDlm_payer &sql(FETCH cListPayer) } &sql(CLOSE cListPayer) quit list

Method.name: GetIdPLV
Method.Implementation: &sql(select ID into :id from BiRLab_CT.HospitalPaymentCategoryVersion where HospitalPaymentCategory=:pId and PriceList=:pVer ) if SQLCODE=0 quit id quit ""

Method.name: HasVersion
Method.Implementation: &sql(select ID into :id from BiRLab_CT.HospitalPaymentCategoryVersion where HospitalPaymentCategory=:pId ) if SQLCODE=0 quit 1 quit 0

Method.name: %OnAfterSave
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %Save method to provide notification that the object is being saved. It is called after the object's data has been successfully written to disk.

insert will be set to 1 if this object is being saved for the first time.

If this method returns an error then the call to %Save will fail.

Method.name: %OnDelete
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %Delete method to provide notification that the object specified by oid is being deleted.

If this method returns an error then the object will not be deleted.
